Definition.WordDefinition: Ryder, ND (city, FIPS 69460) Location: 47.91730 N, 101.67311 W Population (1990): 121 (72 housing units) Area: 0.8 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Ryder \Ry"der\, n. 1. A clause added to a document; a rider. See {Rider}. [Obs.] [1913 Webster]
2. [D. rijder, properly, a rider.] A gold coin of Zealand [Netherlands] equal to 14 florins, about $5.60 (ca. 1910). [1913 Webster]
